title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
There are closed form expressions for the antiderivatives. The response may give an exact value for the area, which is 4 3 + 1 2 ( π 2 −8 ). descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
At most 1 out of 2 points earned if there is one error in the integrand OR 1 error with limits of integration.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
To be eligible for the fourth point, the response must have earned the first two points.

Special case: A response with the expression

π ∫ − 0.585786 0 ( 1 2 ( x+2 ) 2 ) 2   dx +π ∫ 0 0.274156 ( 2−2sin x ) 2   dx =5.688  (or  5.687) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqaHapaCdaWdXgqabaWaae WaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaamaabmaabaGaamiEaiab gUcaRiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaaki aawIcacaGLPaaadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccaaMc8UaaGPaVlaa dsgacaWG4baaleaacWaraAOeI0IaaGjcVlacebiIWaGaiqeGc6cacG araIynaiacebiI4aGaiqeGiwdacGaraI4naiacebiI4aGaiqeGiAda aeaacaaIWaaaniaawUIiaOGaey4kaSIaeqiWda3aa8qSbeqaamaabm aabaGaaGOmaiabgkHiTiaaikdaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gadaGcaaqa aiaadIhaaSqabaaakiaawIcacaGLPaaadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaa GccaaMc8UaaGPaVlaadsgacaWG4baaleaacaaIWaaabaGaaGimaiaa c6cacaaIYaGaaG4naiaaisdacaaIXaGaaGynaiaaiAdaa0Gaay5kIa GccqGH9aqpcaaI1aGaaiOlaiaaiAdacaaI4aGaaGioaiaaykW7caqG GaGaaeikaiaab+gacaqGYbGaaeiiaiaaykW7caqG1aGaaeOlaiaabA dacaqG4aGaae4naiaabMcaaaa@7DF4@

earns the third and fourth points.

There are closed form expressions for the antiderivatives. The response may give an exact values for the limits and volume. The limits are x 1 = 2 −2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bWaaSbaaSqaaiaaig daaeqaaOGaeyypa0ZaaOaaaeaacaaIYaaaleqaaOGaeyOeI0IaaGOm aaaa@38B2@ and x 2 = π 2 36 .
